title: Re: keen brothers
content:

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: keen brothers
content:
I once wrote a letter to 3DRealms asking all sorts of questions, and one guy said that Mortimer actually IS Keen's brother! The logic behind this is...to say the least...disturbing...

-------

KEEN: I'm Commander Keen! Defender of the Universe! Dispensing Galactic Justice with and Iron Fist!

MCMIRE: ...I'm Mortimer McMire...that's it...

Mortimer: Billy...

Billy: ...

Mortimer: I am your mother!

Billy: NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!A lesson in Ascillan:

In the Dawn of a new age

"Chi choo'zilli xa ut kle?"
